meanings.definition: The achievement of a desired result through the use of intelligent design or planning.
meanings.sent1: The telesis of the project was evident in its flawless execution.
meanings.sent2: Her telesis in organizing the event ensured its success.
meanings.sent3: The telesis of the puzzle was so perfect that it solved itself!
meanings.sent4: His telesis in navigating the complex situation was like a master chess player's strategy.
meanings.sent5: The telesis of nature in creating the ecosystem was truly remarkable.

meanings.definition: The process of achieving a goal or purpose through deliberate and organized effort.
meanings.sent1: Through careful telesis, the team completed the project ahead of schedule.
meanings.sent2: The telesis of her study routine helped her ace the exam.
meanings.sent3: The telesis of the ants working together was both fascinating and efficient.
meanings.sent4: The telesis of the marathon runner's training was evident in her strong finish.
meanings.sent5: The telesis of the chef in creating the perfect dish was truly impressive.
